00044 #include "camera.h"
00045 #include <Ogre.h>

00047 namespace phys
00048 {
00049     Camera::Camera(CameraManager* Manager)
00050     {
00051         String Name = Manager->CreateCamera();
00052         this->Construct(Manager->FindCamera(Name), Manager);
00053     }
00054 
00055     Camera::Camera(Ogre::Camera* Camera, CameraManager* Manager)
00056     {
00057         this->Construct(Camera, Manager);
00058     }
00059 
00060     void Camera::Construct(Ogre::Camera* Camera, CameraManager* Manager)
00061     {
00062         this->Cam = Camera;
00063         this->CamManager = Manager;
00064         this->SetNearClipDistance(5.0f);
00065         this->SetFarClipDistance(5000.0f);
00066         SetElementType(Attachable::Camera);
00067     }
00068 
00069     Camera::~Camera()
00070     {
00071     }
00072 
00073     String& Camera::GetName()
00074     {
00075         return this->Cam->getName();
00076     }
00077 
00078     void Camera::SetLocation(Vector3 Location)
00079     {
00080         this->Cam->setPosition(Location.GetOgreVector3());
00081     }
00082 
00083     void Camera::SetDirection(Vector3 Direction)
00084     {
00085         this->Cam->setDirection(Direction.GetOgreVector3());
00086     }
00087 
00088     void Camera::SetOrientation(Quaternion Orientation)
00089     {
00090         this->Cam->setOrientation(Orientation.GetOgreQuaternion());
00091     }
00092 
00093     void Camera::SetNearClipDistance(Real NearDist)
00094     {
00095         this->Cam->setNearClipDistance(NearDist);
00096     }

00099     {
00100         this->Cam->setFarClipDistance (FarDist);
00101     }

00104     {
00105         this->Cam->setAspectRatio(Ratio);
00106     }

00109     {
00110         this->Cam->lookAt(TargetLoc.GetOgreVector3());

00114     {
00115         this->Cam->setFixedYawAxis(UseFixed, Axis.GetOgreVector3());

00123     void Camera::SetAutoTracking(bool Enabled, String Target, Vector3 Offset)
00124     {
00125         Ogre::SceneNode* Trgt = CamManager->FindNode(Target);
00126         this->Cam->setAutoTracking(Enabled, Trgt, Offset.GetOgreVector3());
00127     }
00128 
00129     void Camera::SetAutoTracking(bool Enabled, String Target)
00130     {
00131         Ogre::SceneNode* Trgt = CamManager->FindNode(Target);
00132         this->Cam->setAutoTracking(Enabled, Trgt);
00133     }

00135     Ray Camera::GetCameraToViewportRay(Real Screenx, Real Screeny)
00136     {
00137         Ray R(this->Cam->getCameraToViewportRay(Screenx, Screeny));
00138         return R;
00139     }
00140 
00141     String Camera::GetNodeAttachedToCamera()
00142     {
00143         Ogre::SceneNode* tempnode = this->Cam->getParentSceneNode();
00144         return tempnode->getName();
00145     }
00146 
00147     Vector3 Camera::GetCameraRelativeLocation()
00148     {
00149         Vector3 camloc(this->Cam->getPosition());
00150         return camloc;
00151     }
00152 
00153     Vector3 Camera::GetCameraGlobalLocation()
00154     {
00155         Vector3 camloc(this->Cam->getRealPosition());
00156         return camloc;
00157     }
00158 
00159     void Camera::ZoomCamera(Real Zoom)
00160     {
00161         Ogre::Vector3 zoomlevel(0,0,Zoom);
00162         this->Cam->moveRelative(zoomlevel);
00163     }
00164 
00165     void Camera::ResetZoom()
00166     {
00167         Ogre::Vector3 loc;
00168         loc = this->Cam->getPosition();
00169         Real zoom=loc.z;
00170         zoom=0-zoom;
00171         this->Cam->moveRelative(Ogre::Vector3(0,0,zoom));
00172     }
